title: How to 1 v 1 vayne evrytime
body:
Tired of getting 1 v 1 by vayne with her new assasin build? Well i got the perfect solution for you that works with EVERY single champion in the league.

So we all know that {{champion:67}} likes to rush {{item:3087}} and {{item:3031}}  at the moment. For only 1300 gold you are garenteed to win every 1 v 1 agaisnt her.  
Farm well until you get 1300 gold. Back and buy this cheeky item:{{item:3140}} 
{{item:3140}} :A Focus Sash is an item that, if the champion has full HP and is hit by an attack that would otherwise cause fainting, can survive with only 1 HP. 
With this item vayne will leave you at 1 hp after her first auto attack. (she will attack first since she rushed static shiv)
Proceed to use endeavor to put vayne on one hp.
Finally proced to kill her by using quick attack(this move always attack first)
Hope you guys will you this usefull tutorial in ranked to beat vayne. Post your result in the comment.
-BoostedOfTheStorm the Platiscrub out!

replies.body: How does QSS focus stop you from getting one shot?

Ive seen this somwhere before cant quite put my finger on it

https://i2.wp.com/static.fjcdn.com/large/pictures/fb/bb/fbbb44_1219122.gif
Just in time for Sun and Moon
